title: About Me
content: To work in a challenging environment, which maintains high professional standards, fosters personal growth, provides opportunity for continuous learning and expects quality results. And to utilize my knowledge and skills in the best possible way for the fulfilment of organizational goals.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Currently, I'm seeking a full time software engineering position
